commands.title: JS: Compare two emails (case-insensitive)
commands.description: Compare two email addresses ignoring case and whitespace - common support task (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)

commands.title: JS: Validate email format (regex)
commands.description: Validate email format using regex pattern - basic email validation (mailtrap.io/blog/javascript-email-validation/)

commands.title: JS: Validate and parse JSON safely
commands.description: Parse JSON with error handling - prevent crashes on invalid JSON (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/JSON/parse)

commands.title: JS: Deep compare two objects
commands.description: Compare two objects deeply using JSON stringify - simple equality check (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/JSON/stringify)

commands.title: JS: Extract domain from email
commands.description: Extract domain portion from email address - useful for filtering or grouping (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/split)

commands.title: JS: Format date to ISO string
commands.description: Convert date to ISO 8601 format - standard date format for APIs (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Date/toISOString)

commands.title: JS: Calculate time difference in hours
commands.description: Calculate time difference between two dates in hours - useful for SLA tracking (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Date)

commands.title: JS: Remove duplicates from array
commands.description: Remove duplicate values from array using Set - clean data (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Set)

commands.title: JS: Filter array by property
commands.description: Filter array of objects by property value - data filtering (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/filter)

commands.title: JS: Group array by property
commands.description: Group array of objects by property - organize data (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/reduce)

commands.title: JS: Flatten nested array
commands.description: Flatten deeply nested array structure - simplify data (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/flat)

commands.title: JS: Sort array of objects
commands.description: Sort array of objects by property value - organize data (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/sort)

commands.title: JS: Chunk array into smaller arrays
commands.description: Split array into smaller chunks of specified size - batch processing (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/slice)

commands.title: JS: Merge two objects (shallow)
commands.description: Merge two objects with spread operator - obj2 properties override obj1 (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Operators/Spread_syntax)

commands.title: JS: Extract specific properties from object
commands.description: Extract only specified properties from object - clean data (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Operators/in)

commands.title: JS: Check if string contains substring (case-insensitive)
commands.description: Search for substring ignoring case - flexible text search (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/includes)

commands.title: JS: Generate random UUID
commands.description: Generate random UUID v4 - useful for creating unique identifiers (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Crypto/randomUUID)

commands.title: JS: Encode string to Base64
commands.description: Encode string to Base64 format - useful for API authentication (nodejs.org/api/buffer.html)

commands.title: JS: Decode Base64 string
commands.description: Decode Base64 string to text - reverse Base64 encoding (nodejs.org/api/buffer.html)

commands.title: JS: Calculate object size in bytes
commands.description: Calculate approximate size of object in bytes - useful for size limits (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/TextEncoder)

commands.title: JS: Truncate string with ellipsis
commands.description: Truncate long strings with ellipsis - display formatting (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/substring)

commands.title: JS: Slugify string (URL-safe)
commands.description: Convert string to URL-safe slug - create clean URLs (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/replace)

commands.title: JS: Parse query string to object
commands.description: Parse URL query string into object - extract URL parameters (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/URLSearchParams)

commands.title: JS: Build query string from object
commands.description: Build URL query string from object - construct URLs (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/URLSearchParams)

commands.title: JS: Retry function with exponential backoff
commands.description: Retry async function with exponential backoff - handle transient failures (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)

commands.title: JS: Debounce function
commands.description: Create debounced function - limit function execution rate (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Function)

commands.title: JS: Deep clone object
commands.description: Create deep copy of object - avoid reference issues (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/JSON)

commands.title: JS: Check if object is empty
commands.description: Check if object has no properties - validation helper (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object/keys)

commands.title: JS: Format number with commas
commands.description: Format number with thousand separators - improve readability (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number/toLocaleString)

commands.title: JS: Generate random string
commands.description: Generate random alphanumeric string of specified length - create tokens (developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Math/random)
